verses.1: Pasianʼ tungah a gingin ka kiko khia a, a hong zak theih nadingin a gingin ka kiko hi.
verses.2: Ka lungkham hunin keimah in Topa ka zong hi. Zanin thu ngenin gim het loin ka khut ka zan a, ahi zongin hehnepna ka ngah kei hi.
verses.3: Keimah in Pasian ka ngaihsun a, ka tautau hi. Lung ka geelgeel a, ka gim mahmah hi.
verses.4: A ihmu lo dingin kei na hong bawl a, lungkham lua-in ka pau thei kei hi.
verses.5: Hun luite ka ngaihsun a, sawt pek lai-a kumte ka phawk hi.
verses.6: Zan thapai-in ka lungsimah ka kihoho a, lung geelgeelin thu ka kan ciangin:
verses.7: “Topa in hong nial paisuakin, kei tungah maipha hong piakik lo ding hiam?
verses.8: Ama itna kip bei paisuakin, ama thuciamte maimang suak ding hiam?
verses.9: Pasian in hehpihna a neih ding mangngilh khinta ahi hiam? Ama hehna in hehpihnate vukcip khin ahi hiam?” ka ci hi.
verses.10: Tua bang ahihleh, “Sangpen paʼ hat nawn lohna pen ka khakham veina ahi hi,” ka ci hi.
verses.11: Topaʼ sepnate ka lungsimah ka phawk dinga, hun lui lai-a nangma nalamdangte ka ciamteh ding hi.
verses.12: Nangma nasepna khempeuh ka lung ngaingai dinga, nangma sep na liante ka ngaih sunsun ding hi.
verses.13: Pasian aw, nangma lampi siangtho hi. Eima Pasian tawh kibangin bang pasian lian ahi hiam?
verses.14: Nang pen nalamdangte a bawl, minam dangteʼ lakah na vangliatna alang khiasak khin Pasian na hi hi.
verses.15: Nangmah in na vangliatna tawh Jakob le Josefʼ suante, na mite na hon khia hi.
verses.16: Tui in nang hong muh ciangin Pasian aw, tuite in nang hong muh ciangin a lau uh hi. Tui thukpi zong a liing hi.
verses.17: Meiipite in tui sung khia-in, vante ging damdam a, nangma thaltangte mun citeng ah a leeng uh hi.
verses.18: Na vanging lianpi pingpei sungah omin, khuaphialepte in leitung taan a, leitang liing gawpin a kising damdam hi.
verses.19: Nangma lam lianpi tuipi tung hi a, nangma lam neute zong luilianteʼ tung mah ahi hi. Ahi zongin na khekhapte kimu lo hi.
verses.20: Nangmah in Moses le Aaronʼ khut tawh nangma mite tuu hon bangin na makaih hi.
